page_content: The page provides tax forms and guidelines for associations, foundations, and other legal entities for the year 2021.
The page discusses the responsibilities and services of the Drucksachenverwaltung and Lehrmittelverlag, including the procurement of printed materials and educational resources.
The page offers information on renting a so.fit trailer for sports events and activities.
The page offers a comprehensive guide for career preparation, including worksheets, checklists, and templates.
The page provides information on support measures for individuals seeking to establish self-employment, including unemployment benefits.
The page outlines the procedures and legal requirements for establishing or modifying industrial and non-industrial businesses, focusing on health and safety regulations.
The page offers video tutorials on using QGIS for various geospatial transformations and tasks.
